channel.title: Running 317s on Vista 64 Bit
channel.description: So, I'm really stumped on this, although I have vista 64 bit, is it possible for me to find a way to run 317 clients? Since I have 64 bit, when I run the client, and I click around for a bit, it just shuts down. And my command prompt just says "click anywhere to continue". All help is appreciated thanks in advance :).

item.title: Running 317s on Vista 64 Bit
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

get a newer version of java all my friends are haveing that problem and it seems to fix it

Read full topic
